text: The 1983 Campeonato Nacional was Chilean football league top tier’s 51st season. Colo-Colo was the tournament’s champion, winning its fourteenth title. There was no relegation, in order to increase the number of teams for the next season. ==League table== ==Results== == Topscorer == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Washington Olivera||Cobreloa||29 |} ==Liguilla Pre-Copa Libertadores== \---- \---- ==See also== * 1983 Copa Polla Gol * 1983 Copa República == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1983 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Category:1983 in Chilean football
title: 1983 Primera División de Chile
